None.Name: Gifted Thrill
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, tower shoots penetrating bolts that deals 105 damage to enemy units in a 5m radius around its target, up to 157 in total. Attacked units cannot use their special abilities for 15 seconds. Only affects air units.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the building will repair the building and restore its life points.
